dct_description_sm: von A. Petermann ; Gest. v. Eberhardt & Grunert.
Relief shown by hachures and shading.
Prime meridians: Greenwich, Paris, and Ferro.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Deutsche Meilen" and "Engl. Statute Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, roads and travel routes by land and sea, places of historical interest.
2 inset maps: Jerusalem und Umgegend -- Das Libanon-Gebiet.
